entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
